website_summaries.verdict: This mat offers a non-slip bottom that provides better safety than others on hard floors.
pros: Non-stick bottom makes it less likely to slide when you are using it
Protects any hard flooring including laminate and vinyl, as well as hardwoods
cons: Sometime the corners of the mat curl up

customer_reviews.title: only for light-weight people, not for full-grown men
customer_reviews.text: Too bad I am beyond the "return window", I'd be glad to get rid of this mat. I weigh 190 lbs. The floor mat is on a smooth and solid hardwood floor. This mat is stretching and therefore curling-up at the edge, so that when my chair rolls off the edge, the wheels catch on the edge and won't roll back onto the mat, so I HAVE TO PICK-UP MY CHAIR TO GET MY CHAIR BACK ONTO THE MAT. This is a failed product. This mat might work if you weigh 89 to 100 lbs., but if you are my size or larger, do not buy this mat.
customer_reviews.author: accountantsarefun

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for! Makes the office look better.
customer_reviews.text: Our office has old linoleum flooring and the dirt from the warehouse gets under the office chairs and makes the floor look pretty bad. I got one of these for my office to hide the damage from years of chair use. Works great- it hides the marks and is holding up well after a couple weeks or use. I was concerned about it curling up and not laying flat- but after a day or so it was completely flat and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Allen

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our office at home, where my boyfriend plays video games for hours...wearing out our hardwood floors. The mat is a good size for the area we needed. The mat came rolled up in a box, so it took some coaxing to straighten out and flatten down. The seller sent an email when the item was shipped, and again when it was delivered, just to make sure everything came as expected. They seem like they would be on top of it should anyone be dissatisfied for any reason. We have had no issues, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi D.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: The floor in front of my desk is messed up so I wanted a black mat, not a clear one. This come tightly curled and takes a little effort to get it in position. It curled under on the ends at first, about 1/4 ", but each week it was noticeably lower until after 4 weeks it was flat. As long as you pick up your feet when you walk it doesn't stick up enough in the beginning to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jim  Borger

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair mat. Once I received this I immediately threw away the clear plastic one I had just purchased. It is made of very sturdy material and the chair glides over it easily. I also like the fact it is very easy to clean unlike the other mats I had.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is just the size I needed. It unrolled easily, and flattened down on my floor quickly (after being tightly rolled up for shipping). My desk chair rolls over my hardwood floor easily and doesn't scoot when I roll around. The material seems like it will be very durable, and I won't worry anymore about ruining my hardwood floor by constantly rolling over the wood. I had a question about the shipment, and the seller answered immediately. Very responsive and "anxious-to-please" seller!
customer_reviews.author: tealady

customer_reviews.title: Office Chair
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of them for our office and kids, where mine is on stones and the other ones are on the carpet. The mat is a good size for the area we needed. The mat came rolled up in a box, so it took some coaxing to straighten out and flatten down. The seller sent an email when the item was shipped, and again when it was delivered, just to make sure everything came as expected. They seem like they would be on top of it should anyone be dissatisfied for any reason. We have had no issues, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hello-Motto

customer_reviews.title: Edges curl up and it slides around
customer_reviews.text: Got this to put under my husband who works from home and has worn an ugly ring into the hardwood with his office chair. He refused any efforts for a rug or a more standard chair mat, but was open to this one. Within a week, the edges have curled up by about 2 inches, creating a tripping hazard and interfering with the chair wheels. It also tends to move around, so the chair wheels are again attacking the poor wood floor. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: ArialM

customer_reviews.title: Solved a studio problem fast!
customer_reviews.text: Our music studio is in a basement with carpet and linoleum over concrete floors and the linoleum is in bad shape. This little mat provides a nice stable surface for my work chair between the desk and the edge of the rug. It tucks easily under the rug edge and I finally have a smooth surface for the wheeled chair. It is a bit difficult to clean as the surface is rough, but that is also what makes the mat functional. That's not a big deal. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: James Mctamaney

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as intended, but found a new use
customer_reviews.text: Chair kept catching on mat as it rolled over it, causing the mat to bend upward at the edges. This resulted in multiple stubbed toes and one nasty cut. But in all fairness, this mat is meant to be used on a bare floor, and mine has some very worn carpeting. I didn't feel I could return the item since it was damaged by the chair, but the seller was generous enough to refund my full purchase amount anyway, and the mat has found a new use as a barrier between cat litter boxes and carpeting, where I only trip over it occasionally. So happy ending.
customer_reviews.author: rbyteme

customer_reviews.title: Durable and just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Came a day quicker than expected which is always nice. It took less than a day for it to uncurl itself and laid perfectly flat. I always get a bit worried there will be a strong plastic smell from these types of products, but it didn’t have any strange odors. It’s very durable and thick enough to protect my hardwood floors from my office chair. Would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great for wood floors
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this product to help protect my wood floor from my office chair. It has worked as expected and is exceptionally durable and is quite easy to clean. The only thing I would recommend is that you purchase some sort of rug stopper to place underneath it, as it will slide back-and-forth if you move your office chair too much.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crandell

customer_reviews.title: Great chair mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a good chair mat! It makes it smooth for my chair on the floor and it’s soft to touch. It’s very sturdy and won’t rip. It helps my chair not to roll all over the floor. Unfortunately it doesn’t fit perfectly under my desk but it’s not too big of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described with two different textures - one antiskid for the floor and non slip for the chair. Lies flat after a few days. The black is a nice change from the clear I had before (the clear ended up yellowing and showing scratches). Mine is placed on a cork floor and the matt is much more stable than the clear was. Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Solid mat
customer_reviews.text: Solid mat with adequate traction and protection between my chair and hardwood floor. Lightweight. A bit longer than I expected which is nice. Wish my wheels didn't roll so easily on it but it's overall good so far.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I got my mom a new desk and computer chair for Christmas. When searching on Amazon for accessories to go with her gift, i came across this chair mat. Its is absolutely perfect. Its thin, but sturdy. The chair glides nicely on the mat. Its is also very easy to clean. We have dogs, so you can assume that also comes with dog hair which is easy to sweep right off the mat. Will purchase again when i get my own desk set up.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's room so that his rolling chair wouldn't scratch up the floor. It bent up within the first few days and curled up. Even though we tried to add the weight of the desk to try to make sure it won't curl up it still did. Definitely not worth $30. Wish I could honestly get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Merino

customer_reviews.title: Hard floors only!
customer_reviews.text: It shipped to me rolled up, so I took a few days to flatten it out with heavy books before I even tried to use it. As of now, I have no issues with the mat rolling back up or anything like that. Only problem I see with it, which is totally my fault for not reading the description well enough, this mat is for hard floors only and I needed one meant for carpet.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Protects Hard Wood Floors
customer_reviews.text: This product Protects Hard Wood Floors and it seems to do exactly that. It comes rolled up but it now lays flat and stays in place. Highly Recommend it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great desk mat!
customer_reviews.text: Now with students at home, this mat is a lifesaver for my hardwood floors. It fits perfectly under the desk with plenty of room to move the chair without scratching the floor. Product arrived promptly and was in perfect condition. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as ordered
customer_reviews.text: Floor mats were exactly as ordered. Nice thick plastic to keep my shiny laminate floors safe from the computer chair wheels. Feels fine under my chair wheels with no snags.
customer_reviews.author: Space Cadet

customer_reviews.title: This product is junk! It slides around and won't ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk! It slides around and won't stay in place, and the edges roll up. The chair cannot roll off the mat and back on, if needed, because this product is so thin and flimsy that it just catches.
customer_reviews.author: shoeshopper

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and perfect for protecting hardwood flooring
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this office mat shortly after discovering minor abrasions on my wooden flooring. The mat works fantastic. It has held up to my chair shifting around and doesn't slide. The only problem, is that you can see every ounce of dust and dirt due to the dark coloring. Running a vacuum wand over the surface will generally clean it. The plastic appears to be durable enough to take outside and spray down with a water hose; for those of you who can't keep coffee and soda from spilling into your lap. :P Overall, this is a fantastic product and I'll be purchasing another for my sister to use in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Poor material. Don’t trust the review.
customer_reviews.text: The material is very thin. When I unroll it, it never flattens out completely as shown in the picture. There is a crease as well and will not disappear. I thought the material is soft. Actually it is hard like clear vinyl one. As a result, the chair is too easy to move. I should spend a few more dollars to buy from Staples.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Product came rolled up, I laid it on the floor nothing on the ends for about 5 hours then placed it under my desk. There is a smooth glossy side and a flat textured side. I played around if I wanted the glossy side up or the textured side up. Kept it simple and went with the textured side. Product lays flat with no rolling on the end.
customer_reviews.author: S.Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! No sliding at all! I haven't had it very long yet but from what I can tell, it looks like it will last a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: T Markus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tripping hazard
customer_reviews.text: Besides in this curl up causing a tripping hazard I killed it back the other way but they curl back up I even used double-sided tape to try to stop them from curling up doesn't do a damn thing don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: C. Scully

customer_reviews.title: On hardwood floor, chair frequently gets caught on edge and pulls it up
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if others mentioned this, but the mat (on hardwood flooring) catches on my chair's wheels if they roll over the edge, then the wheels proceed to pull up the edge and it needs to be stamped back down. So annoying. This happens after 1 year of regular use, and it has always occurred. They could have mitigated the problem by making the mat thicker, but didn't
customer_reviews.author: carbonclump

customer_reviews.title: Reclining chair and hard wood floor
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the the clear plastic mat it did not 'keep' the chair from sliding. Using this pad in place of the clear plastic mat and it kept the chair in place and no more 'scratches' on the wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I WAS IRRITATED ON THE MAT. Because the Mat's edge's Curling Up.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is curling-up at the edge, so my chair rolls off the edge, the wheels catch on the edge and won't roll back onto the mat. so I must pick up my chair back onto the mat. SO EVERY TIME I SIT ON MY CHAIR ON THE MAT, I WAS IRRITATED. SO I THREW THE MAT INTO THE GARBAGE CAN after 2 month of my purchasing. The manufacturer should fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Chung

customer_reviews.title: Hard time staying flat, but works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well and good value for the money, but it does have a bit of a hard time staying flat on the floor. Using the adhesive pads helped, but didn't fully resolve the problem. Having heavyweights on the corners for a week helped too, but still, it tends to bend back inward if given the chance. 4/5 stars, would buy again, considering almost all other mats in the same price range would have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Klein

customer_reviews.title: A Little love and commonsense looks great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put in the HOT SUN with 2by4 boards on top the mat in my driveway it sarted wrinkle,I new it was hot enough then Put it in my garage floor to let it cool down, now flat and looks good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard McClure II

customer_reviews.title: It just lays there
customer_reviews.text: Durability and Sturdiness...who came up with different words that mean the same thing? Damn! It prevents my chair from making deep ruts in my wood flooring. I've never cleansed it, so what?
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Highly recoimmended
customer_reviews.text: This mat fixed a serious problem, covering broken veneer on the floor. It is flexible and durable, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Ross Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Curls at edges, catches on wheels and quickly deforms
customer_reviews.text: This mat will stretch and then the edges will start to curl up. When that happens, your casters will catch the edges and start bending it back and curling it up. This process will continue to get worse and soon the mat will be unusable. Unfortunately, my return window closed two weeks ago - I should have been quicker to react to the issue and get it handled.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Madonna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This mat does change color easily, unlike advertised. It also will start to curl up and you will have to lift your chair every time to get back on the mat because other wise your chair get's stuck trying to pull the mat up. I am smaller and only weigh 100 pounds so even for light weight people it will still get messed up. It may last the first 3 months but it starts going bad conveniently right after their 90 day buy back guarantee. Save your money and find another mat because this one will end up in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Camp

customer_reviews.title: Plastic is bubbling up, total junk!
customer_reviews.text: Regret buying this everyday. It's bubbling up all over the place. Total ripoff. Throwing this in the trash and buying something else. Despite the reviews do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark e Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Works great on concrete.
customer_reviews.text: First one started curling up on the edges. After leaving a two star review saying such, the company that makes these mats contacted me in order to issue a refund. I felt this was unnecessary and asked for a replacement instead. So far this one is working great with no curling and no more wheels getting caught. I'm glad I bought it and I like how easy and great the customer service was to talk to.
customer_reviews.author: Zaryn Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't lay flat!
customer_reviews.text: This mat will NOT lay flat. I've tried everything! It seems good quality, good size, etc. but I cannot get it to lay flat! The edges curl downward into the floor so half the mat isn't even touching the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and exactly what I needed to begin working from home last minute. Allows my computer chair to slide across my shag carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Sahra Riser

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to cover my hardwoods due to having to purchase an office chair to work from home. Sturdy and good size. Black goes perfect with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: trace

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Sorry for the review. This piece is very difficult to clean. It still has not flattened out after a few months and does not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: mama2three

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product and the price it is very reasonable. I like how lite it is and the material is easy to clean. I was looking around for a chair mat and after reading the review on this one I purchase it. No regret at all.
customer_reviews.author: Phuoc Ly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst chair matt I have ever had. It slides but my chair doesn't slid. It curls up and dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: stacy lynette reiser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mat for 3 weeks and I am not finding any issues. Delivery was fast and nice packed. I will recomend this product. PS: I am using this mat on wooden flooring. I am not sure how its on carpet flooring
customer_reviews.author: Trik

customer_reviews.title: Not What I had hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: This mat definitely disappointed. It was very flimsy, didn't stay in place and was always trying to roll itself back up and jump back in the box it came out of. It was easy to clean, but that was the only good thing about this mat. I recently moved and needless to say, the mat did not move with me. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Davan Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great product, awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: A nice product, great price with even better customer service. Works great in our office, buy here first!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better; could be worse.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it slides around on wood or plank floors. Wish it had a little bit of grip on the bottom - but it serves its purpose for now.
customer_reviews.author: C. REDFEARN

customer_reviews.title: Rolled up tight
customer_reviews.text: The one and the only reason I ordered this particular mat is that it was advertised to not curve. It comes in a tight roll from a verticle box. It's made of very thin plastic and has no give from the original tight roll. Someone with more patience might use a hair dryer or apply days of chair pressure evenly to all corners for days and weeks, but to me, that should not be part of the consumer's problem if it's advertised to not curl. This one goes in the recycling bin, and I'm off to find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Summers

customer_reviews.title: floor mat a little small i shoud have measured my old one first
customer_reviews.text: the mat is great it is smaller than expected my fault for not measuring my old one first the edges go up sometimes when i roll over the edge that is my only problem with it
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Chair mat
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, got my mat and I am very happy with it.....it's nice that I no longer have to deal with struggling with my chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Received the mat as scheduled using 2 day shipping. Within 24 hrs it is now laying flat after rolled tight for shipping. Purpose is to protect our hard wood floor from wear and tear of office chair rolling. This mar will work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dale W Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Good floor protection!
customer_reviews.text: This was a more reasonably priced item, and it was worth it. I have "soft" hard floors that after an hour in the chair you'll see the imprints in the floor, so this helps with that.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT flatten!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these mats previously, with no problem. This mat will not flatten. We have put weights and books on it, to no avail. It, still, pops up! Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Arrow2013

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is the worst. It’s very thin so the corners and ends all rolled up. I’m not happy with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Must get.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase! The mat is made of great quality, came very nicely wrapped with extra protection. Cute little thanks note from the manufacturers and as I’m sure you imagine it came rolled up and just took overnight maybe 24 hrs for it to completely flatten out. I am not the type of person to ever write reviews but this is most definitely worthy of one! Will update with a pic later on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: It looks like its going to work out just fine. I'm pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonsmom91

customer_reviews.title: 4hr chair not a 8 hrs chair
customer_reviews.text: Work from home purchase this chair it’s good for 4 hr after that back pains
customer_reviews.author: latanya

customer_reviews.title: stop the rolling
customer_reviews.text: makes it easy keep my chair from rolling backwards on my uneven floor
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy during COVID working from home and I love it. My dog had an accident on it and it washed off very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, gotta be a better one somewhere
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job but despite the "no-slip" feature on the base, it doesn't really stay put very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Stays put, good quality, doesn't curl!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect. I went through several other types. We have hardwood floors, the other mats slid or bunched up, this one stays put without marking up the floor. Doesn't curl, easy to clean. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: DLNY

customer_reviews.title: Black chair mat
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of this and it cleans very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: This will never actually lay flat and super thin quality. They give you sticky pads to put on your hardwood floor why would you use those and destroy your hardwood just doesn't make much sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L.

customer_reviews.title: Not tapered on the edges like most, curled up and the chair gets stuck ...
customer_reviews.text: Not tapered on the edges like most, curled up and the chair gets stuck on it now if one wheel rolls off of it and it’s all bent and mangled. Crap quality, I got what I paid for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rineer

customer_reviews.title: Great mat, perfect size for my desk area
customer_reviews.text: Great mat, perfect size for my desk area. It’s a flexible material that has texture on both sides. Though the top is textured my chair rolls smoothly on it. The mat has yet to even budge an inch from it’s spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mat a couple months. When I received it i thought it would be thicker and lay down better. This mat is very thin. I constantly moves and bunches up under my desk. I don't believe it really is made to be used on a bare floor because it doesn't have any type of padding to keep it in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Bill's Service Center

customer_reviews.title: Well Crafted
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It looks great, is the perfect size, functions as expected, and does not scratch or warp. Packaging was excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryude

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is what they described, it works good. However, for durability, I wish it was thicker but it’s still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey The Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly adequate chair mat. Slips a little less than the average one. 10/10 would recommend for anyone in need of a chairmat. Note - while it's no issue for me, the mat will show a good amount of the dust/dirt on it since it is black.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Pales

customer_reviews.title: Still working great after a year of use!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping your floor from getting damaged from a rolling chair!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Barreras

customer_reviews.title: Not for carpeting
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t discover until after I got it, it is made for hard flooring, not for carpets. Chair wheels catch on th edge.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. McNutt

customer_reviews.title: Was good for about 3-6 months... then the edges roll up
customer_reviews.text: The edge rolling up problem is a bad one with this mat. Incredibly annoying and makes this mat basically useless. Was perfect for period of time, but need to replace quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Product Good, Company needs to lay off the emails.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but the company kept emailing me to review it. One email would have been fine. 3 emails within as many days is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't quite what I expected, but it's still functional ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't quite what I expected, but it's still functional nonetheless. Its basically a plastic square you put down so your chair wheels don't scratch up the hardwood. It works very well, I just wish the top service was more of a felt material. I do find myself arbitrarily rolling a bit while sitting at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good, but doesn't stay put on hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. I thought it would not slip as much on my hardwood floor, but I keep having to move it back to position as the daily rolling around on my chair causes it to move.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely shop with LESONIC in the future!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the chair mat! Would highly recommend it for use on hard surfaces. LESONIC shipped quickly and followed up with me throughout the process. They are on their toes to ensure you are completely satisfied. Great doing business with them. Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am using this mat under my desk chair. It laid flat right away and it is still flat and no problems with it. Matches my black chair.
customer_reviews.author: ROSEBUD

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: After three months of having this I have not had any issues with it. It does its job. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wide and thin.  Perfect for protecting my wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: I use these mats under my chairs in my sewing rooms. I have hard wood floors and they are perfect. They are not too thick and wide enough for me to move around without coming off the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlyn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great chair mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair mat. It completely flattened out after just a few days, and has saved my hardwood floors from the risk of getting marked up by my computer chair. Doesn't seem to move around much if at all. I would recommend this product. The seller has also been great, contacting me directly to ensure I received/liked the mat. Great customer service. Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Russell

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It slides on my wooden floor. I have to fix it's possession by the end of the week. Strong material well made.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this item ever again. It’s been almost three weeks and the mat has not flattened out I have put heavy objects on it to flatten it out but nothing. After just about three weeks it looks like I’ve had it for years. Regret buying it
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the floor mat. Just what I wanted, attractive and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Floor Mat
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised perfect size, if you need a need a new mat, then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair mat and it fits exactly where I want it to. Looks great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and edges wont lay flat
customer_reviews.text: Description said this would lay flat after a day. Well, that didn't happen and the material is cheap as hell. Out of all the items I purchase on Amazon, this is by far the worst Purchase I have made. If I still had the box, I would return this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!!!
customer_reviews.text: This does not stay in place. Slides all over the floor. Would not buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this on LVP and it looks great. No slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Versco

customer_reviews.title: This mat came rolled up and I could never get ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat came rolled up and I could never get it to flatten out. Every time I had to roll my chair over to the printer, I had to lift the chair up and put it back on the mat because it wouldn't roll over the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Deenie Piland

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work well. The ends flip upwards with use. I have had issues since I purchased it and tries different work arounds to resolve. I would like my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Suarez

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am very satisfied. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Very sturdy. Wish it went just a touch lower. The cat loves sleeping on this, and there is room for my partner to sit with the cat behind him
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Will scratch your hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: Product needs a thin soft pad underneath. Ordinary dirt gets under and mat moves around so will scratch floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: Hazmat arrived on time and looked great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I expected/wanted. Pictures accurately reflect the product. Great go to if you don’t want the standard clear plastic mat.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Grimaldi

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first but now it just rolls up under my chair and moves all over
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice, but on our laminate wood floor it just slides around and then rolls up under the chair wheels. I got it so we could protect the floor and got a rug mat in hopes that would keep it in place, but it still moves around.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Little

customer_reviews.title: Hard to make them flat
customer_reviews.text: All OK one negative part is really hard to make them flat even six months later they still curved
customer_reviews.author: Adesignstore

customer_reviews.title: Laying them out in the sun helps flatten them out
customer_reviews.text: “I've been using these mats for about a month on a hard tile surface and have not had any issues with them curling. I just had to let them sit out in the the sun for about 10 minutes to flatten them out after unboxing (they come rolled up) but other than that they are working perfectly.”
customer_reviews.author: J. Ubina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't grip well to floor on either side of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't grip well to floor on either side of the mat. Constantly shifts. Works for what I purchased for to protect floor tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Roy

product_meta.title: Office Chair Mat for Hard Floor : 35x47 inches Straight Edge Rectangular Sturdy Multi-Purpose Polyethylene + EVA Desk Chair Mat for Hardwood Floor (Black)
feature_bullets: ✔️NEW IMPROVED QUALITY! We just improved our Chair Mat materials to POLYETHENE with added EVA to avoid CURLING issues. This desk chair mat is Odorless, Non-Toxic, PVC free, BPA & Phthalate-free, and free from tin, lead, and other metals. 100% recyclable to keep a healthy indoor environment. PLEASE BE AWARE THAT WE STARTED SELLING WITH IMPROVED MATERIALS SINCE AUGUST 2019.

✔️HARD FLOOR PROTECTION - Protect your flooring from scratches and marks of any kind with this perfect computer chair mat for hardwood floors such as tile, laminate, vinyl, concrete, and linoleum. Ideal floor mats for office chair and delicately designed for Hard Floors only, NOT suitable for carpets or half rug.

✔️LARGE & DURABLE DESIGN - Rectangular shaped chair mat 35 x 47” big enough to protect floors from scratches. Highly durable non-slip floor protector for home or office chair, protected with anti-slide coating on the underside which is designed to firmly stay in place while in use. Be extra productive with this office chair mat for hardwood floor.

✔️BUILD TO LAST – These desk chair mats are thick and sturdily made of pure long life polyethylene material with EVA, no cracks, curls or discoloration. It allows an office chair to move freely while carrying out daily tasks, helping considerably reduce the risk of leg fatigue.

✔️BUY WITH CONFIDENCE - We are dedicated to providing premium quality products for your home and office at affordable prices. Order your desk chair floor mat and get a 90-Day 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, no questions asked. Click ADD to CART NOW!!!
